name: Zigging Ride
description:
Sit tight, buckle up and keep eyes on surroundings. Now it is the time to take endless journey in Zigging Ride.

Zigging Ride is an arcade style game to let car hover in the air and avoid crashes on buildings, ground, city force field, and incoming traffic. Collect Zios to boost scores or gain temporarily abilities.

Bon voyage!

More information on: https://www.seinus-inc.com/ziggingride
